title: The Corsair's Crown
description: His companion is a man. A general. A noble. Not even human. The fate of their kingdom, awash in bloody war, hangs on their relationship; pirates, spells, and politics threaten to destroy them both. And all Calentine ever really wanted was to fish in peace.*Sequel to The Sailor's General Superior, slash, unrevised version*Words: 137,507 complete
author: IceraMyst
